# Quest Eternal (Level 13 Diviner)
## Overview
*Stuffed between the pages of these two well-worn volumes are all manner of riddles, tidbits of lore, and fragments of maps*. *One of the covers is missing a corner, as if hacked off with a blade, and the text inside is tiny and cramped, as if the author were afraid of running out of room.*

**Opposition Schools** Conjuration, transmutation

**Value** 6,705 gp (8,355 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

7th—*[[Arcane Sight, Greater (Spell)|greater arcane sight]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|greater scrying]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Prismatic Spray (Spell)|prismatic spray]]*

6th—*[[Chain Lightning (Spell)|chain lightning]]*, *[[Contingency (Spell)|contingency]]*, *[[Eyebite (Spell)|eyebite]]*, *[[Legend Lore (Spell)|legend lore]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]* <sup>S</sup>

5th—*[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, *[[Fire Snake (Spell)|fire snake]]*, *[[Prying Eyes (Spell)|prying eyes]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Telepathic Bond (Spell)|telepathic bond]]* <sup>S</sup>

4th—*[[Arcane Eye (Spell)|arcane eye]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Confusion (Spell)|confusion]]*, *[[Detect Scrying (Spell)|detect scrying]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Fear (Spell)|fear]]*, *[[Ice Storm (Spell)|ice storm]]*, *[[Wall of Fire (Spell)|wall of fire]]*

3rd—[[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|clairaudience/clairvoyance]] <sup>S</sup>, *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, *[[Displacement (Spell)|displacement]]*, *[[Magic Weapon, Greater (Spell)|greater magic weapon]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Hydraulic Torrent (Spell)|hydraulic torrent]]*, *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]*, *[[Seek Thoughts (Spell)|seek thoughts]]*, *[[Tongues (Spell)|tongues]]* <sup>S</sup>

2nd—*[[Arcane Lock (Spell)|arcane lock]]*, *[[False Life (Spell)|false life]]*, *[[Fox's Cunning (Spell)|fox’s cunning]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Locate Object (Spell)|locate object]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, *[[Scorching Ray (Spell)|scorching ray]]*, *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Touch of Idiocy (Spell)|touch of idiocy]]*

1st—*[[Alarm (Spell)|alarm]]*, *[[Charm Person (Spell)|charm person]]*, *[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|comprehend languages]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Color Spray (Spell)|color spray]]*, *[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|detect secret doors]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Expeditious Excavation (Spell)|expeditious excavation]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Floating Disk (Spell)|floating disk]]*, *[[Protection From Evil (Spell)|protection from evil]]*, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]*, *[[True Strike (Spell)|true strike]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Ventriloquism (Spell)|ventriloquism]]*

0—standard plus *scoop*, *[[Spark (Spell)|spark]]*

**Preparation Ritual**

**Travel Sage (Su)** There is nothing like a magic book to enhance the memory. Unlike other boons, you do not spend this one. Until you prepare spells again, you are considered trained in [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (geography). If you are already trained in [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (geography), you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on those checks instead.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 124
